news_header: Don Durrett predicts gold and silver prices will rise significantly by 2025, despite a potential pullback.
news_original_title: Don Durrett: Gold, Silver Price Targets and 15 "Must-Own" Silver Stocks
news_text: In an interview with Investing News Network, Don Durrett from GoldStockData.com shared his optimistic outlook for gold and silver prices in 2025, expecting both metals to increase significantly. He cautioned, however, that there might be a temporary decline, potentially bringing gold down to between $2,350 and $2,400 per ounce before a rally. Durrett forecasts gold could reach $3,200 to $3,400, while silver might rise to between $45 and $65 per ounce. He also mentioned 15 essential silver stocks to consider.
